testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to update the information of the product category with the specified ID via an API connection.
testcase.name: When a PATCH request with valid credentials, a non-existing (id), and correct data (title) is sent to the

failure.message: status code: 405, reason phrase: Method Not Allowed

testcase.failure:
* The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/updateProductCategory52145" path parameters........passed * The api user prepares a PATCH request containing the "Education and Training" information to send to the api updateProductCategory endpoint..passed * The api user sends a "PATCH" request and saves the returned response......failed * The api user verifies that the status code is 203.........................skipped * The api user verifies that the "remark" information in the response body is "failed"..skipped * The api user verifies that the "data.message" information in the response body is "There is not product category for this id."..skipped
